items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Ensure GDPR compliance for user data usage

notes: Assumed that the platform already exists and the requirement is to add AI-powered recommendations. No details provided on specific algorithms or data sources; assumed collaborative filtering and content-based methods.
